title: Ratio of government expenditure to gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Mexico 2024
yAxis: Ratio of government expenditure to GDP
summary: Overall Ratio of government expenditure to GDP has decreased over the Year.
Ratio of government expenditure to GDP is roughly constant from 2018 to 2019, gradually decreasing from 2019 to 2020, and finally roughly increasing from 2020 to 2022.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2019 and 2020.
Maximum Ratio of government expenditure to GDP, about 25.67 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Ratio of government expenditure to GDP about 24.67 was reached at Year 2021
min_summary: In general Ratio of government expenditure to GDP has stayed the same over the Year.
Ratio of government expenditure to GDP is roughly constant from 2018 to 2019, gradually decreasing from 2019 to 2020, and finally roughly increasing from 2020 to 2022.
